name: Rock,Paper,Scissors. Loot!
description:
R,P,S.Loot! is a 2d rouge-like game where you defeat enemys by playing rock, paper, scissors. This was made as part of my course at Abertay  university to learn C# and Unity.

Before this i had little to no experince in both C# and Unity.

Game requires only a mouse to play.

Art credit:

skeleton enemy's - Ouren

https://opengameart.org/content/skeleton-warrior-1

environment - Szadi art

https://szadiart.itch.io/pixel-platformer-castle
